alert.note: Alert for Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 11:17AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT APACHE COUNTY THROUGH 1245 PM MDT... At 1216 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Upper Forest Mountain, or 23 miles southeast of Chinle, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Face Rock Overlook, Sonsela Buttes, Upper Forest Mountain, Spider Rock Overlook, Canyon De Chelly National Monument, and Sawmill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau
